properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 3 at 4:28AM AKST until January 3 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6
inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph.

* WHERE...Southern Inner Channels southeast of Cleveland Peninsula.

* WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 6 PM AKST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty
winds could bring down tree branches.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The snow is expected to be a wet heavy snow
so removal may be difficult.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit
511.alaska.gov.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM AKST THIS EVENING SOUTHEAST OF CLEVELAND PENINSULA
